scripts.test: for f in examples/*; do echo "Compiling $f"; mkdir -p build; echo "'lang sweet.js'; import { class, protocol, implements } from 'sweet-interfaces';" >build/build.js; cat "$f" >>build/build.js; sjs build/build.js >/dev/null || exit $?; done
scripts.build-loose: node -e 'fs.mkdirSync("build", { recursive: true })' && ecmarkup --load-biblio @tc39/ecma262-biblio --verbose spec.emu build/index.html --lint-spec
